ONE OR EIGHT

Introduction

Reia is a Japanese singer and member of the boy group ONE OR EIGHT.

He was formerly a trainee under the K-pop company HYBE after being scouted in 2018. Reia then trained and lived in Korea for three years. He later joined the survival show WARPs DIG and eventually placed 4th, earning a spot in the final lineup of ONE OR EIGHT.
